    • resolveLogMessages

      public List<LogRecord> resolveLogMessages(TestLogLevel level, String message, Class<? extends Throwable> throwableClass)
      Parameters:
      level - to be checked for message, must not be null
      message - to be checked, must not be null
      throwableClass - to be checked, must not be null
      Returns:
      a List of found LogRecords

    • resolveLogMessagesContaining

      public List<LogRecord> resolveLogMessagesContaining(TestLogLevel level, String messagePart)
      Parameters:
      level - to be checked for message, must not be null
      messagePart - to be checked, must not be null. Compared to resolveLogMessages(TestLogLevel, String) this method check whether the given text is contained within a LogRecord
      Returns:
      a List of found LogRecords

      Returns:
      a List of found LogRecords
